stimulusHtml: When a student adds 30.0 mL of 1.00 M HCl to 0.56 g of powdered Fe, a reaction occurs according to the equation above. When the reaction is complete at 273 K and 1.0 atm, which of the following is true?
choicesHtml: HCl is in excess, and 0.100 mol of HCl remains unreacted.
HCl is in excess, and 0.020 mol of HCl remains unreacted.
0.015 mol of FeCl2 has been produced.
0.22 L of H2 has been produced.
